channel.title: Comments on: The Stills, Logic Will Break Your Heart (Vice/Atlantic)

item.title: By: The Stills unsign to Vice, Drawer B
item.dc:creator: The Stills unsign to Vice, Drawer B
item.description: [...] know, if I had a record label and one of my bands followed up a perfectly solid debut with this lopsided turd of a record, I’d be, uhh, trying to make them someone [...]
